creditline: The Mary Ruth Weisel Endowment for Africa, Oceania, and the Americas and gift of Robert T. Coffland in memory of Mary Hunt Kahlenberg
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: irregular rectangular panel; medium brown with black designs; overall freeform designs with rectangular grids with scrolls at corners, pairs of arcing lines surrounded by dots, sun forms, and circles
title: Barkcloth panel
